text: Need Andrew Clark for Zambrero campaign. Budget around $12,105, looking for 2 x Instagram post, 1 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x 10-minute unboxing, 2 x Instagram reel, 2 x TikTok video. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Need to confirm: usage rights
